commands:
Here's a rewritten version of the script that should work better with the line-by-line execution:
echo "Checking for Python 3..." python3 --version echo "Creating virtual environment..." python3 -m venv .venv echo "Activating virtual environment..." . .venv/bin/activate echo "Installing dependencies..." pip install -e . pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
echo "Running ruff..." ruff check --fix . echo "Running black..." black --preview . echo "Running isort..." isort . echo "Running pyright..." pyright echo "Running pytest..." pytest pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY After installing a new dependency, update requirements.txt or dev-requirements.txt as appropriate
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages
twine upload dist/* Upload packages to PyPI (requires twine to be installed and configured)
python tests/license_check.py Run license checking script
cd benchmarks && ./exercism_practice.py --max_iterations $MAX_ITERATIONS --max_workers $MAX_WORKERS --max_benchmarks $MAX_BENCHMARKS --language $LANGUAGE Run benchmarks for a specific language (e.g., javascript or python)
cd benchmarks && ./benchmark_runner.py --retries $RETRIES Run real-world benchmarks
